query:
UPDATE tabs_content 
SET 
  htmlContent = '# Test Tab\n\nThis is a test with an image shortcode:\n\n{{image1:center}}\n\nMore text after the image.',
  backgroundType = 'gradient',
  backgroundValue = 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
  notionDatabaseUrl = 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300'
WHERE documentId = 1 AND tabNumber = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2fBkiNFiDGExDsE.fc940ce39930 --database jkvEoGLbv7QkcKGpVwBVtE --execute 
UPDATE tabs_content 
SET 
  htmlContent = '# Test Tab\n\nThis is a test with an image shortcode:\n\n{{image1:center}}\n\nMore text after the image.',
  backgroundType = 'gradient',
  backgroundValue = 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
  notionDatabaseUrl = 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300'
WHERE documentId = 1 AND tabNumber = 1;
